scripts.build:app: shx rm -rf dist && tsc -p . && webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config webpack.preload.config.js && shx cp -r public dist/public && shx mkdir dist/lib && shx cp -r ../../node_modules/obs-studio-node dist/lib/obs-studio-node && shx mkdir dist/osn-data
scripts.gen:app:preload: cross-env ts-node script/generatePreload.ts && npm run lint:fix
scripts.release:app: git checkout release/wowarenalogs/app && git pull && git merge --no-edit --no-ff main && git push && git checkout main
